title: 2 Chip Stocks to Buy to Play Next Year’s 5G iPhone, Analyst Says
text:
Skyworks Solutions and Qorvo stock will rise because of the chip stocks’ exposure to 2020’s 5G-enabled Apple iPhones, according to Cowen. The firm raised its ratings to Outperform from Market Perform for both companies.

The shift to 5G—fifth-generation—wireless technology is tremendously important to the semiconductor and telecommunications industries. Analysts expect 5G to deliver 10 to 40 times the current speed of 4G LTE networks. Its lower latency promises to make possible new applications from self-driving vehicles to...
description: Skyworks Solutions and Qorvo stock will rise because of the chip stocks’ exposure to 2020’s 5G-enabled Apple iPhones, according to Cowen. The firm raised its ratings to Outperform from Market Perform for both chip companies.
